hero.subtitle: Needs a Bridge
hero.description: We connect Albanian expertise with global opportunities. From Tiranë to the world, we build digital bridges that transform ideas into reality.

hero.title: Every Bridge Tells
hero.subtitle: A Story of Connection
hero.description: From a vision in Tiranë to bridges spanning the digital world - this is the story of how we connect Albanian craftsmanship with global ambition.

story.title: The Construction of Our Bridge
story.subtitle: Four stages that built our foundation and vision

milestone1.title: Laying the Foundation
milestone1.description: October 31, 2025 - The first stone was laid. Z.E DIGITAL TECH SHPK was officially registered, creating a legal foundation strong enough to support our ambitious vision of connecting Albania to the world through technology.

milestone2.title: Raising the Pillars
milestone2.description: We identified six core services - six pillars that would support our bridge. Software development, AI solutions, consulting, marketing, design, and training. Each pillar carefully designed to carry its part of the load.

milestone3.title: Building the Arches
milestone3.description: With pillars in place, we began forming the arches - the connections between Albanian expertise and global opportunities. Every project became another stone, every client another successful crossing.

milestone4.title: Opening the Bridge
milestone4.description: Today, our bridge stands complete and open. From startups to enterprises, from Albania to the world, we facilitate the crossing of ideas into reality, dreams into digital products.

team.title: Meet the Master Builders
team.subtitle: The architects and engineers behind every stone
team.founderDescription: The visionary who designed the bridge, planning every arch and calculating every load. With years of experience in software development and a passion for connecting worlds.
team.adminDescription: The structural engineer ensuring every detail meets the highest standards. Managing operations and ensuring the bridge remains strong and safe for every crossing.

values.title: The Principles We Build Upon
values.subtitle: Four cornerstones that guide every decision and every project

value1.title: Innovation
value1.description: Like ancient bridge builders who pushed the limits of what was possible, we embrace new technologies and creative solutions.

value2.title: Quality
value2.description: Every stone placed with precision, every arch carefully calculated. We build to last generations, not just seasons.

value3.title: Connection
value3.description: A bridge's purpose is to connect. We forge relationships between clients and solutions, between Albania and the world.

value4.title: Excellence
value4.description: The mark of master craftsmen is visible in their work. We take pride in every line of code, every pixel, every strategy.

legal.title: Our Legal Foundation
legal.subtitle: Built on solid ground with official registration and full compliance

cta.title: Cross the Bridge With Us
cta.description: Every great project starts with a conversation. Let's discuss how we can build your bridge to success.

footer.description: Building digital bridges from Albania to the world. Every line of code, every pixel, every strategy - another stone in a structure connecting your vision with reality.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Z.E DIGITAL TECH SHPK. Every stone carefully placed.
